subject: Re: mike, about asking questions
author: psfponies
full_text:
I agree please dont give up Frank. You are the reason I come to this 
site I wanted to learn more about the Franks box and how it works. I 
still find it so mind boggling that you were about to come up with a 
box to communicate with the dead. I have only recorded a few session 
and have already got the message I_see_princess at least the spirits 
all now who started the box research!

Newbie Kay



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Wiliam Clarke <reesclarke_69@...> 
wrote:
>
> Please don't give up.  I am still learning, and I need a teacher.  
Even though we don't know each other.  I try to learn something 
everday from you, so I will be able to make my own box one day.   
Even if is a frankinized 12-469, or made from a car stereo.  I with 
ya all the way, even though some stuff I know nothing about, and 
thats why I learn, to get educated on the subject.  I have already 
studying basic electronics.
>    
>   William
> 
> Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>            I give up! Don't listen to someone that has done this 
stuff longer than anyone. Just get all your information from TAPS, 
and Paranormal State, ---- Hollywood! All friggin' glamor and greed 
and attention seekers, nothing else! And that seems to be all that 
is sought after on these groups. I don't have time for this, and 
this not what I made the boxes for! 
>  
>  Whatever you do don't let spirit speak, try to second guess 
everything, always assume y'all are so much more advanced. 
>  
>  
>  Frank-S
> 
>

>   Get in touch in an instant. Get Windows Live Messenger now.

Mobile.  Try it now.
